mapper.update:
update LAW_CASEBASEINFO set
DISTRICT=#{district},
ILLEGALREGION=#{illegalRegion},
DISCOVERTIME=#{discoverTime},
HAPPENEDTIME=#{happenedTime},
ACCEPTTIME=#{acceptTime},
CASEREASON=#{caseReason},
REGISTERCASENO=#{registerCaseNo},
INSTANCEID=#{instanceID},
FILLFORMTIME=#{fillFormTime},
FILLFORMPERSON=#{fillFormPerson},
FILLFORMDEPARTMENT=#{fillFormDepartment},
ISLANDCHANGE=#{isLandChange},
ISSATELLITE=#{isSatellite},
URGENCYDEGREE=#{urgencyDegree},
ILLEGALNATURE=#{illegalNature},
CASENATURE=#{caseNature},
CASETYPE=#{caseType},
ILLEGALBODY=#{illegalBody},
ILLEGALPURPOSE=#{illegalPurpose},
CASESOURCE=#{caseSource},
BELONGDEPARTMENT=#{belongDepartment},
DETAILADDRESS=#{detailAddress},
BASICFARMLANDAREA=#{basicFarmLandArea},
ARABLELANDAREA=#{arableLandArea},
AREA=#{area},
LAWLESSNATUREDETAIL=#{lawlessNatureDetail},
LAWLESSNATURE=#{lawlessNature},
DELAYSTATUS=#{delayStatus},
DELAYREASON=#{delayReason},
DEALILLEGALTRUTH=#{dealIllegalTruth},
NEXTNODES=#{nextNodes},
IMPORTANCE=#{importance},
EXECUTIVECONDITION=#{executiveCondition},
PUNISHMENTCONTENT=#{punishmentContent},
CASEBRIEF=#{caseBrief},
DEALSITUATION=#{dealSituation},
CREATEUSER=#{createUser},
BUILDTIME=#{buildTime},
VERSION=#{version},
LANDCHANGESURVEYYEAR=#{landChangeSurveyYear},
LANDCHANGESURVEYNO=#{landChangeSurveyNo},
FINDWAY=#{findWay},
ISLOCATION=#{isLocation},
REALSHAPE=#{realShape},
SHAPE=#{shape},
LANDCHANGEMAPSPOTYEAR=#{landChangeMapSpotYear},
LANDCHANGEMAPSPOTNO=#{landChangeMapSpotNo},
SATELLITEIMAGESYEAR=#{satelliteImagesYear},
SATELLITEIMAGESNO=#{satelliteImagesNo},
PATROLROUTE=#{patrolRoute},
PATROLTIME=#{patrolTime},
PATROLPEOPLE=#{patrolPeople},
ASSIGNREQUIREMENTS=#{assignRequirements},
ASSIGNTIME=#{assignTime},
ASSIGNWAY=#{assignWay},
ASSIGNDEPARTMENT=#{assignDepartment},
DISCLOSURETIME=#{disclosureTime},
MEDIANAME=#{mediaName},
REPORTCONTENT=#{reportContent},
REPORTERPHONE=#{reporterPhone},
REPORTERADDRESS=#{reporterAddress},
REPORTERHOUSEHOLD=#{reporterHouseHold},
REPORTERAGE=#{reporterAge},
REPORTERSEX=#{reporterSex},
REPORTERNAME=#{reporterName},
REPROTERIDCARD=#{reporterIDCard},
REPORTCASEPHONE=#{reportCasePhone},
REPORTCASETYPE=#{reportCaseType},
ILLEGALTRUTH=#{illegalTruth},
caseID = #{caseID} where caseID = #{caseID}
